explanation: Several chat participants mention BTC attempting an upside move, successful retests, and breakouts on the 1-minute and short-term timeframes. There is discussion of volume pushing upward, funding rates decreasing while open interest rises, and buyers appearing stronger than sellers. Some caution is present due to potential traps and lower volume, but overall, the majority sentiment points to bullishness in the very short term. No strong consensus for high conviction, but signals are more positive than negative.
